reviews.review: Un juegazo, visualmente precioso y con una historia magnifica simplemente una fantastica obra de arte; que a mi parecer supera a los dos anteriores bioshocks.

Hikayesi başarılı,grafikler 2013 te cıkmıs bir oyun için çok iyi,fiyatı gayet uygun etkileyici bir finalı mevcut.Ayrıca silahlarını upgarde etme karakterine özellikler edinme ve geliştirme gibi bazı rpg elementler mevcut.12ç25 tl cok iyi fiyat ben oyunu bitridim herkese öneriyorum indirim bitmeden alın bu fırsatı kaçırmayın.İlk 2 oyunu oynanamamıs biri olarak ilk indiriminde remastered larınıda edinicem :).

Its pretty much exactly like the previous bioshock games. Well, minus the ADAM, big daddys, little sisters, splicers, plasmids, and the ocean. 

Basically the main character takes LSD with a girl and they spend the day bashing innocent communists on a high-sodium diet. Oh and theres this bird who thinks you have bird food in your pocket and follows you around everywhere.
Шикарная игра.Очень интересный сюжет и динамичные сражения не дадут заскучать.
Poor story, too short, too easy, linear AF. Worst one out of the 3. Only positive is that it was a pretty and smooth game. yawn

An amazing game, and in my opinion the best in the BioShock series. The Last of Us may have been released in the same year as this game, but I still think that this game had as much of a chance of winning Game of the Year as The Last of Us did.

2013 must have been a good year for gaming.
Стоющая,красочная игра,всем советую)
THIS IS THE BEST GAME I HAVE EVER PLAYED EVER! BUY THIS GAME OR I WILL COME TO YOUR HOUSE AND KILL YOU.

First off, simply wow.

I completely do not define myself as a singleplayer type of game player, but really the beautiful art style and seeing the email from Steam saying Infinite on sale really got me. I had to give it a chance, and wow was it worth every minute. The main story consists of about 8 hours if you include a little free roam time and looting. I wanted to explore every inch of this beautiful world. The combat was good, but got very repetitive, especially when I was so into the story, just wanting to get to what happened next, but Irrational did a fine job of building the story to where every next step there was a even further step. Without spoiling the game, all i can say is wow. Simply astounding how this company thought so in depth into a story line that truly not only intrigued me, but astonished me. 

Art 9/10
Sound 8/10
Story 9.8/10
Price 10/10 Well worth the sale amount I paid

Overall, I say give this game a try. Even if this isn't normally the type of game you play, let yourself get connected in the story like I did. It was truly a wonderful experience.

The story is normally why I play games. This game is not only wildly original with its gameplay design, but the story was immense. I kept on this game until I finished it, and I have to say it was because I HAD to see what was next in the story. The characters were well personafied, and very individualistic. Hell, the responding when you die was immersive, until you go down like 20 times in a row. I highly reccomend this game to those who dig the stories the most.

great game! lots of content, great plot and pretty graphics

Bioshock Infinite is great game that makes you feel MLG. You get to run, gun, smack, explode, clobber, slaughter, get betrayed, get revenge, and of course jump off a skyline and destroy whoever you land on. But besides all of the MLG glory in this game there's also a great storyline which may or may not confuse you. But in the end you figure out what is going on. Besides storyline and MLG you get to become dat boi's best friend by setting explosive and not so explosive traps that kill anyone who is near them. You also get to become a genetic freak which that, of course, IS AMAZING. My conclusion is that if you don't buy this game then you're missing out and also buy the season pass with it.
10/10 would be an MLG scrub who buys Bioshock Infinite and season pass bundle.
All this racism was just what the Bioshock series was missing. 10/10 Grand Wizard's would play again!

Recomendo a todos que já jogaram o primeiro e o segundo Bioshock, e também para quem esta com vontade de jogar, recomendo tanto esse Bioshock como os outros, vale muito a pena.

虽然支持语言里没有写中文,但是在游戏列表右键属性->语言里选择中文就会更新中文包,进去后就是全部中文字幕了,包含游戏一些图片的文字
It is a good game.
Great game, enjoyed it very much.
Шикарная игра с отличным сюжетом, всем кто не играл советую именно этот Bioshock
Я не хочу заново проходить эту игру просто потому, что я снова могу заплакать.

写在开头：
生化奇兵-无限，此游戏号称本世纪八神之作，何为八神？
1、神剧情-惊心动魄
2、神画面-虚幻3引擎鼎抗之作（再看看同样牛逼的逃生2，你就知道完全不是一个档次）
3、神优化-随便一台小屁台式机笔记本就能畅玩
4、神结局-你决定想不到的结局
5、神压抑-越玩越压抑，越玩越想哭，受不了
6、神女主-伊丽莎白，我不想作你父亲，我想。。。。
7、神DLC-海葬是DLC？别扯淡了，放在当今游戏界，随便拿出来就是一个独立作品
8、神游戏性-生化奇兵无限你打算玩几个周目？少于4个周目别跟我说话，断交吧

写在中间：
本来这种世纪大作我是不想写评测的，没意义，质量摆在这里，2K财阀最辉煌的作品，2亿美元的大手笔投资，分分钟秒杀当时以及现在基本99%的游戏。但是应朋友要求，没办法，我把我的观点写一写，PRO和CON就不写了，PRO大家都知道，CON没有，我只是写一写我对这游戏的理解以及这个游戏到底值不值得steam新人购买。

1、这游戏什么类型？
如果一定要讲的话，PREY可谓是此游戏比较优秀的后代了，当然，差距太明显了，无论剧情深度还是角色刻画完全不是档次，虽然PREY我也很喜欢，也算是个3A大作，但是跟无限比。。。差远了
2、这游戏主人公讨喜么？
你们以为主人公是你们操作的布克？NONONO，他是酱油而已，真正的主角是伊丽莎白。。。我去，不谈了，每次谈到她我就非常心疼，一个是心疼她为啥是我XX而不是。。。（用XX代替避免剧透，通关后你们自然明白我说的什么）另一个就是她太可怜了，一个游戏把主角塑造到让大家欢乐很容易，但是如果塑造到让大家难受甚至心疼，太难了，伊丽莎白就是这其中最最让我揪心的，如果说还有这种感觉的话，那就是大圣娶亲2里面的“爱你一万年”了。。。
3、这游戏我买了本体95元，还需要买season pass吗？
云端激战我不推荐，就是刷刷刷的游戏，但是海葬1和海葬2必须买，为啥？本体的剧情你是不是还有些不明白的地方？去玩玩海葬就明白了。最关键的，你想不想操作伊丽莎白？海葬实现你的愿望。海葬作为载入史册的神DLC绝对不是浪得虚名的，剧情深度和游戏性绝对超越现在所谓的DLC。你说巫师3？血与酒的质量勉强可以与之抗衡，这下懂了吧？

抱歉，说不下去了，优点太多了，又没有缺点，你让我还能说什么，有问题下面留言提问吧。。

说在最后：

此游戏绝对你此生必玩之作，如果你喜欢玩游戏却没有玩过生化奇兵无限，那你还是趁早回家找腾讯爸爸去吧，我救不了你。
Easily the best game I have ever played I cannot recommend it enought. A must-play game
This game is beautiful, has a fantastic story, and has better gunplay compaired to previous titles (imo).
Amazing story

Simplemente, uno de los mejores Bioshock por detrás de la primera entrega. Esta vez, no estaremos dentro de Rapture, la ciudad submarina de los dos primeros Bioshock, sino en Columbia, una ciudad flotante en las nubes que se separó de los EEUU. Ciudades distintas, con un nexo en común.
La historia va sobre un hombre, Booker DeWitt (en esta entrega de Bioshock, vemos el rostro y sabemos el nombre real del protagonista), que acepta un trabajo para liquidar sus deudas. Así nos veremos en ese nexo en común de todos los Bioshock: el faro. A partir de ahí, se desarrolla una historia que gira en torno a recuperar a Elizabeth, una cautiva en una torre vigilada por un pájaro gigante metálico llamado Songbird (se podría decir que es el "Big Daddy" de Columbia). A partir de aquí, se desarrolla una historia que si bien al principio parece tópica y sencilla, se va complicando (y mucho) conforme vamos avanzado y sabiendo cosas. Los personajes están muy bien caracterizados, las diferentes localizaciones de Columbia muy bien ambientadas... en este apartado 0 pegas. Es más, hasta el final dá que pensar.
En gráficos a día de hoy sigue estando muy bien, usa efectos DX11 que hace que Columbia parezca una ciudad angelical. Y además tiene muchas opciones de configuración, cosa que en sus dos primeras entregas estaban más limitadas.
Música, efectos y en especial el cuidado doblaje están a un nivel muy superior, insuflándole más vida a este juego que de por si destila calidad. Por poner algo negativo, es que cuando activas un voxáfono y empieza a hablar alguien, es imposible oir lo que reproduce hasta que la segunda voz termina de hablar. Pero esto es algo muy muy subjetivo.
El sistema de juego es como en los anteriores Bioshock. Los plásmidos se llaman vigorizadores (pudiendo hacer diferentes combos devastadores con ellos) y los tónicos son piezas de equipo (sombrero, chaqueta, pantalones y calzado) intercambiables que dan diferentes atributos de manera pasiva. También tendremos un escudo que nos ayudará a aguantar más antes de que nuestra vida empiece a disminuir y el uso de los aerocarriles nos hará tener ventaja táctica cuando nos veamos en peligro. Y como siempre, tendremos las máquinas expendedoras que nos venderán munición, mejoras para armas y vigorizadores...
Y respecto a los DLC's, Enfrentamiento en las Nubes es más o menos como las Pruebas del Protector de Bioshock 2. Panteón Marino (está dividido en dos partes) me parece el mejor DLC de este juego de largo, un guiño o despedida para aquellos que jugamos a los dos primeros Bioshock. Además conecta con la historia principal de Infinite. La guinda del pastel para este juego. Hay un tercer DLC, pero es basicamente un booster de armas, piezas nuevas de equipo y águilas de plata extra.
En resumen, si te gustaron los anteriores Bioshock este te debería gustar igual o más. Está cuidado en todos sus aspectos. 9/10.

> [i]"Siempre hay un faro, un hombre, una ciudad"[/i].
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Simply one of the best Bioshock games after the first Bioshock. This time, we are not in Rapture, the underwater city of the first two Bioshocks, but in Columbia, a floating city in the sky that seceded from the United States. Different cities, but with a common link.
The story is about a man, Booker DeWitt (in this installment of Bioshock, we see his face and know the real name of the protagonist), who takes a job to pay off their debts. Soon,  we will be in that common link of all Bioshock share: the lighthouse. From there, a story that revolves around recovering Elizabeth, a captive girl in a metal tower guarded by a giant metallic bird called Songbird (you could say it's the Columbia's "Big Daddy"). From here, a story that, while at first seems to be simple and topical, becomes complicated (much) as we advanced through the game and started to know things. The characters are very well characterized, the different locations Columbia are very well set... Moreover, even the end of the game will keep you thinking about it.
In graphics even today is still very good, it uses DX11 effects that makes Columbia look like an angelic city. And it features many configuration options, which in its first two deliveries were more limited.
Music, special effects and dubbing care are at a much higher level, breathing even more life to this game which in itself exudes quality. To say something negative, it is that when you activate a voxophone and someone starts talking, it is impossible to hear what plays until the second voice finishes speaking. But this is something veeeery subjective.
The gameplay is like in the previous Bioshock. Plasmids are now called Vigors (can make different devastating combos with them) and Tonics are pieces of equipment now (hats, jackets, pants and shoes) that give different attributes interchangeable passively. We will also have a shield that will help us endure more before our life begins to decrease and the use of "Sky-line" will give us tactical advantage when endangered. And as always, we will have the typical vending machines that sell us ammunition, weapons and Vigors upgrades...
And speaking about the DLC's, Clash in the Clouds is more or less like the Protector Trials of Bioshock 2. Burial at Sea (it's divided into two parts) seems to me the best DLC of this game by far, a wink or a farewell for those who we played the first two Bioshock. Besides, it connects to the main Bioshock Infinite main story. The icing on the cake for this game. There is a third DLC, but is basically a booster of weapons, new equipment and extra silver eagles.
In short, if you liked the previous Bioshocks, you will like this one even more. It has been cared in all its aspects. A masterpiece. 9/10.

This is basically just as good as Half Life 2. The reason why I state this is because you have a strong female character that supports you like Alyx Vance.

The graphic and visual designs are just as beautiful as Half Life 2, with additional details that make you feel these are bullcrap yet convincing just like Half Life's story telling technic. Everything you see if kind of BS, yet, the game makes you believe it.

However, you can only carry 2 weapons, so ammunition management is hardcore in the game if you want to play harder difficulties. But don't be upset, how can you forget the fact that you're a "Magiciain"? You can use special powers and combine them into a deadly combo which not only save up your ammo but make your fight less troublesome.

And keep in mind to look around for "Special clothing" that give you additional bonus. Like increased total ammunition for all guns, increased stats for yourself, and gain temporary immunity when you just get off the roller coaster track. Some are useful against right enemies, so make sure you get the right choice.

And your lovely companion, Elizabeth, she will provide you all the avalible support as she can. So make good use of her special abilities, like tear, which she can warp in weaponry, consumables, battle advantages, and friendly killing robots to aid you in the battle.

You will collect money all the way through, but try to save as much as possible and invest them either in your magic power effectiveness or guns' deadliness. As the longer you proceed, the stronger and powerful your enemies are. So try not to spend too much on consumables, you can find hp kit and mana potions almost anywhere, as long as you don't just "OMOMOMOMOM" everything up when you just have small chunk of hp loss or mana used.

In total: The game is just as amazing as Half Life series, a must for everyone who loves good story telling and visual designs.
Um dos melhores jogos da minha vida

BioShock Infinite must be the closest a game has ever been to be perfect, everything from its sound design, gameplay, mechanics and breathtaking atmosphere makes it a complete masterpiece. It exceeds in every single thing it attempts, from its intense and fun FPS combat, to its perfect story and voice acting, to its beautiful and immersive atmosphere and graphics that never ages, not even 8 years later. Its ending is extremely impacting and the best I have ever seen in anything, being it a game, movie or even book. All of this comes together to create of of the best (if not the best) games ever made, as simple as that. BioShock Infinite is simply perfect. The DLC's are also completely worth it since they add to even more perfectly developed story content and changing both the mechanics and dynamics of the game, for a refreshing yet still amazing experience. 
BioShock Infinite: 10/10
BioShock Infinite: Clash in the Clouds: 9/10
Bioshock Infinite: Burial at Sea Episode 1: 9.5/10
BioShock Infinite: Burial at Sea Episode 2: 9.75/10
Великолепная игра!!! Атмосфера, сюжет, графика - все на высшем уровне. Тут без сомнений советую всем любителям интересного сюжета!

After playing Bioshock 1 and 2, Bioshock infinite really does hold up to the great story telling and brilliantly scripted world that the originals had, And expands upon it with all the new technology available to developers. Just walking around and taking in the atmosphere rewards you in this game as you can really sense the world in which the devs had achieved to create, and they have ultimately succeeded in doing so.

I would highly reccomend this game.

Oyun tek kelime ile oynadığım en çılgın first person shooterlardan biri çünkü konuşuyorum oyunda . elizebeht ile olan insanlık mı yoksa bireysellik mi yoksa ikili tercih yaptığımız çift sayesinde önümüze çıkanı vurmaktan ayrı oyunda sonra nolucak diye düşünüyoruz oyunda çatışma sahnelerinden sonra yaşanan boşluğu konuşmalar çok iyi doldurmuş . hikayesinde ise iyi ve kötü arasında çok kalıyoruz çünkü kız paralel evrenlere gidip duruyor . bıraktığımız yer de kalmıyor . Booker olmak havalı gelse de öldürdüğümüz insnaları düşününce kötü olması ile insanlığa bir sesleniş oyun . ben çok beğendim oyunu hemde çok grafik ve çizim olarak muhteşem manzara olsun hanım kızımız elizabeth olsun muhteşem bir oyun tekrar ve tekrar

Tavsiye ederim, oynayın ama season pass için aynı şeyleri söylemeyeceğim. But It would have been better if there had been  Turkish language too.

They removed object physics/destructible environments and telekinesis from this game and totally butchered it. Watch "The Bioshock we never got" By Crowbcat on YT, and look up "Bioshock Infinite Removed Content". Also changed the themes in the game from political to religious and tampered with the original concepts . All in all, a completely bland game with nothing to stand out for after the years have gone by. What is original in this game engine? Does the engine bring anything unique? What? Jumping onto railings? Having a stupid hook arm doesn't count, it's like the wrench from 1 but worse. Everyone who rates this game highly, you have no idea or you don't care what a good game engine is otherwise you'd see how lame this game ended up being.

===============================================
BIOSHOCK INFINITE  Original SoundTrack   ' Elisbath'   Touching my Heart

[h1]生化无限有一个好剧情，但是距离神作还有所差距。（含剧透）[/h1]
作为一款fps，生化系列的射击手感总感觉有些问题，同时大量的重复战斗会导致玩家很快的产生枯燥感[spoiler]然后被e妹吸引回来[/spoiler]游戏性只能说是中规中矩。

[b]但是[/b]

生化无限通过大量的对话和游戏中的互动鲜活的塑造了个性突出的人物，[strike]鬼父[/strike] 主人公布克、[strike]最佳神棍[/strike] 剧情推动卢斯特二人组、[strike]鬼父二号[/strike] 反派康姆斯托克[spoiler]然而就是主角[/spoiler]还有递枪递药递蓝四处摸金还带开锁聊天的 [strike]女朋友[/strike]  女儿e妹。被操作手感和敌人ai拖累的游戏终于在此得到了救赎。

对于整个系列来说，生化无限使其构成了一个自闭的循环，海葬第二章的最后又是游戏第一部的开始，这一作的剧情完美的诠释了infinite——一个悲剧的起源、经过、终结与再度重复。[strike]e妹死得好惨[/strike] 其实这是一个很残忍的故事，所有的这些人不停的重复着悲欢离合走向同一个不可逆转的be和又一次的开始。

说句题外话，哥伦比亚的色调风格都非常出色[spoiler]然后越来越崩坏[/spoiler]

如果一定要用一句话总结这游戏的话，那一定是：[spoiler]打得好，我选择鬼父[/spoiler]
[spoiler]看标题以为我是黑的都too naive，我对e妹爱得深沉[/spoiler]

This is one of the best first-person shooters I ever played, very storydriven, graphics are great (for that era), the diversity between weapons and upgrades makes the game have high replay value, as well as customizing Mr. DeWitt with a plethora of vigors/equipment. You can find your own playing style by trying out different combos. I highly recommend this.
